description: This file defines API routes for handling food orders in a food delivery backend system using FastAPI. It includes endpoints for creating new orders and retrieving existing ones, with associated database interactions and data validation.

classes.name: Order
classes.description: Database model representing a food order

classes.name: OrderItem
classes.description: Database model representing an item in an order

classes.name: MenuItem
classes.description: Database model for a menu item

classes.name: OrderCreate
classes.description: Schema for creating a new order

classes.name: OrderItemOut
classes.description: Schema for outputting order item details

methods.name: User _get_user_or_anon(db: Session)
methods.description: Retrieves a default guest user or creates one if none exists

methods.name: create_order(order_in: OrderCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Endpoint to create a new order with given items

methods.name: get_order(order_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Endpoint to retrieve an existing order by ID
